snippet.title: How, after 60 years, Brown v. Board of Education succeeded -- and didn't
snippet.description: The Brown decision wiped out the "separate but equal" rule, but did its accomplish its main goal?

snippet.title: Wonkbook: The number of Obamacare enrollments matters less than you think
snippet.description: Here are a few reasons why that 7.1 million figure isn't as important as you think.

snippet.title: James R. Schlesinger, CIA chief and Cabinet member, dies
snippet.description: Mr. Schlesinger served as CIA director, secretary of defense and the nation's first secretary of energy.

snippet.title: The 'Islam is different' argument
snippet.description: "Islam is not a religion," televangelist Pat Robertson has argued. "It is a political system bent on world domination."

snippet.description: The main obstacle Iran and the U.S. face in making a deal is their domestic audience.

snippet.title: Redskins vs. Giants: Robert Griffin III plays a sharp game but doesn't get much help in loss
snippet.description: With a tailored game plan, Robert Griffin III passed efficiently and ran well, yet his teammates let him down.
